location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, currently based at Bombay, to Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter instructs Taylor to procure five tons of gum ammoniac on the Company's account. Includes an enclosure: a letter, dated 16 June 1812, from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Bruce, Bombay, asking Bruce to relay his instructions to his agent at Bushire. The enclosed letter has its own enclosure: a list of current prices of drugs and other goods in the Bushire market.
